name: Wizard Battle (itch)
description:
The objective of this game is to trap your opponent. Played on a randomized 5x5 grid, each turn you have to move, the distance you move is the value of the tile you are on. If you cannot make any legal moves, you lose. After moving you cast a spell on an unoccupied tile, either raising or lowering its value.

A 1v1 board game based on a ruleset I found on an old forum as a hobby piece. Made in 24hrs.

Link to the archived forum where the game's concept and rules were found: http://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/8941465/
